page.title: 10INDUSTRY IN NTH.KILWORTH
page.content: {C.Y.O SEEDS} { """"""""""""" {C.Y.O SEEDS}are moble seed cleaners .They take their machines to farms to clean grain and put chemicals on it,so farmer can sell it more easily.{C.Y.O. {SEEDS}employ 3 full time & 12 partime people.Some of the partimers come from North Kilworth but not many. {C.Y.O SEEDS}make their own machines.They are situated by Carryfast on the main road from Lutterworth to Market Harborough. {CHANDLERS { """""""""} Occupying a part of Ball's buildings, which used to be a blacksmih's forge,is a small business making wire brushes. The labour is mostly local.
